results.definition: the time of day immediately following sunset
examples: they finished before the fall of night

results.definition: the diffused light from the sky when the sun is below the horizon but its rays are refracted by the atmosphere of the earth
a condition of decline following successes
examples: in the twilight of the empire

results.definition: lighted by or as if by twilight
examples: The dusky night rides down the sky/And ushers in the morn"-Henry Fielding
the twilight glow of the sky
a boat on a twilit river
